class.name: WWListItem
class.brief_description: This class stores the properties of a diesel engine for a specific resistance position on the controller in the driver's cabin, used when the locomotive has resistance start. Each instance of WWListItem represents a single resistance position.
class.description: Defines properties for a specific resistance position on a diesel locomotive's controller.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], shunting is available for this controller position. It is not related to shunting maneuvers or maneuvering at all
Maximum current draw at this controller position.
Maximum power output at this controller position.
Maximum voltage at this controller position.
Maximum wake-up power at this controller position.
Maximum wake-up voltage at this controller position.
Minimum wake-up voltage at this controller position.
Target RPM at this controller position.
